00020 #define ADDB(b) do { int id = this->id((b));            \
00021     if (id != -1) feature_.push_back(id); } while (0)
00022 
00023 #define COPY_FEATURE(ptr) do {                                          \
00024     feature_.push_back(-1);                                             \
00025     (ptr) = feature_freelist_.alloc(feature_.size());                   \
00026     std::copy(feature_.begin(), feature_.end(), const_cast<int *>(ptr)); \
00027     feature_.clear(); } while (0)

00031 const char* FeatureIndex::getIndex(char **p, char ** column, size_t max) {
00032   ++(*p);
00033 
00034   bool flg = false;
00035 
00036   if (**p == '?') {
00037     flg = true;
00038     ++(*p);
00039   }  // undef flg
00040 
00041   CHECK_RETURN(**p =='[', static_cast<const char *>(0))
00042       << "getIndex(): unmatched '['";
00043 
00044   size_t n = 0;
00045   ++(*p);
00046 
00047   for (;; ++(*p)) {
00048     switch (**p) {
00049       case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':
00050       case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':
00051         n = 10 * n + (**p - '0');
00052         break;
00053       case ']':
00054         CHECK_RETURN(n < max, static_cast<const char *>(0))
00055             << "given index is out of range: " << n;
00056 
00057         if (flg == true && ((std::strcmp("*", column[n]) == 0)
00058                             || column[n][0] == '\0')) return 0;
00059 
00060         return column[n];  // return;
00061 
00062         break;
00063       default:
00064         CHECK_RETURN(false, static_cast<const char *>(0)) << "unmatched '['";
00065     }
00066   }
00067 
00068   return 0;
00069 }

00071 void FeatureIndex::set_alpha(const double *alpha) {
00072   alpha_ = alpha;

00075 bool FeatureIndex::openTemplate(const Param &param) {
00076   if (param.get<bool>("identity-template")) {
00077     unigram_templs_.clear();
00078     bigram_templs_.clear();
00079     unigram_templs_.push_back("U:%u");
00080     bigram_templs_.push_back("B:%r/%l");
00081     return true;
00082   }
00083 
00084   std::string filename = create_filename(param.get<std::string>("dicdir"),
00085                                          FEATURE_FILE);
00086   std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str());
00087   CHECK_FALSE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << filename;
00088 
00089   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00090   char *column[4];
00091 
00092   unigram_templs_.clear();
00093   bigram_templs_.clear();
00094 
00095   while (ifs.getline(buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00096     if (buf[0] == '\0' || buf[0] == '#' || buf[0] == ' ') continue;
00097     CHECK_FALSE(tokenize2(buf, "\t ", column, 2) == 2)
00098         << "format error: " <<filename;
00099 
00100     if (std::strcmp(column[0], "UNIGRAM") == 0)
00101       unigram_templs_.push_back(this->strdup(column[1]));
00102     else if (std::strcmp(column[0], "BIGRAM") == 0 )
00103       bigram_templs_.push_back(this->strdup(column[1]));
00104     else
00105       CHECK_FALSE(false) << "format error: " <<  filename;
00106   }
00107 
00108   // second, open rewrite rules
00109   filename = create_filename(param.get<std::string>("dicdir"),
00110                              REWRITE_FILE);
00111   rewrite_.open(filename.c_str());
00112 
00113   return true;
00114 }
00115 
00116 bool EncoderFeatureIndex::open(const Param &param) {
00117   return openTemplate(param);
00118 }

00120 bool DecoderFeatureIndex::open(const Param &param) {
00121   const std::string modelfile = param.get<std::string>("model");
00122 
00123   CHECK_FALSE(mmap_.open(modelfile.c_str())) << mmap_.what();
00124 
00125   const char *ptr = mmap_.begin();
00126   unsigned int maxid;
00127   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, maxid);
00128   maxid_ = static_cast<size_t>(maxid);
00129   alpha_ = reinterpret_cast<const double *>(ptr);
00130   ptr += (sizeof(alpha_[0]) * maxid_);
00131   da_.set_array(reinterpret_cast<void *>(const_cast<char *>(ptr)));
00132 
00133   if (!openTemplate(param)) {
00134     close();
00135     return false;
00136   }
00137 
00138   return true;
00139 }

00164 void FeatureIndex::calcCost(LearnerNode *node) {
00165   node->wcost = 0.0;
00166   if (node->stat == MECAB_EOS_NODE) return;
00167   for (const int *f = node->fvector; *f != -1; ++f)
00168     node->wcost += alpha_[*f];
00169 }
00170 
00171 void FeatureIndex::calcCost(LearnerPath *path) {
00172   if (is_empty(path)) return;
00173   path->cost = path->rnode->wcost;
00174   for (const int *f = path->fvector; *f != -1; ++f)
00175     path->cost += alpha_[*f];
00176 }
00177 
00178 const char *FeatureIndex::strdup(const char *p) {
00179   size_t len = std::strlen(p);
00180   char *q = char_freelist_.alloc(len + 1);
00181   std::strncpy(q, p, len);
00182   return q;
00183 }

00185 bool DecoderFeatureIndex::buildFeature(LearnerPath *path) {
00186   path->rnode->wcost = path->cost = 0.0;
00187 
00188   std::string ufeature1;
00189   std::string lfeature1;
00190   std::string rfeature1;
00191   std::string ufeature2;
00192   std::string lfeature2;
00193   std::string rfeature2;
00194 
00195   CHECK_DIE(rewrite_.rewrite2(path->lnode->feature,
00196                               &ufeature1,
00197                               &lfeature1,
00198                               &rfeature1))
00199       << " cannot rewrite pattern: "
00200       << path->lnode->feature;
00201 
00202   CHECK_DIE(rewrite_.rewrite2(path->rnode->feature,
00203                               &ufeature2,
00204                               &lfeature2,
00205                               &rfeature2))
00206       << " cannot rewrite pattern: "
00207       << path->rnode->feature;
00208 
00209   if (!buildUnigramFeature(path, ufeature2.c_str()))
00210     return false;
00211 
00212   if (!buildBigramFeature(path, rfeature1.c_str(), lfeature2.c_str()))
00213     return false;
00214 
00215   return true;
00216 }

00218 bool EncoderFeatureIndex::buildFeature(LearnerPath *path) {
00219   path->rnode->wcost = path->cost = 0.0;
00220 
00221   std::string ufeature1;
00222   std::string lfeature1;
00223   std::string rfeature1;
00224   std::string ufeature2;
00225   std::string lfeature2;
00226   std::string rfeature2;
00227 
00228   CHECK_DIE(rewrite_.rewrite2(path->lnode->feature,
00229                               &ufeature1,
00230                               &lfeature1,
00231                               &rfeature1))
00232       << " cannot rewrite pattern: "
00233       << path->lnode->feature;
00234 
00235   CHECK_DIE(rewrite_.rewrite2(path->rnode->feature,
00236                               &ufeature2,
00237                               &lfeature2,
00238                               &rfeature2))
00239       << " cannot rewrite pattern: "
00240       << path->rnode->feature;
00241 
00242   {
00243     os_.clear();
00244     os_ << ufeature2 << ' ' << path->rnode->char_type << '\0';
00245     const std::string key(os_.str());
00246     std::map<std::string, std::pair<const int *, size_t> >::iterator
00247         it = feature_cache_.find(key);
00248     if (it != feature_cache_.end()) {
00249       path->rnode->fvector = it->second.first;
00250       it->second.second++;
00251     } else {
00252       if (!buildUnigramFeature(path, ufeature2.c_str())) return false;
00253       feature_cache_.insert(std::pair
00254                             <std::string, std::pair<const int *, size_t> >
00255                             (key,
00256                              std::make_pair<const int *, size_t>
00257                              (path->rnode->fvector, 1)));
00258     }
00259   }
00260 
00261   {
00262     os_.clear();
00263     os_ << rfeature1 << ' ' << lfeature2 << '\0';
00264     std::string key(os_.str());
00265     std::map<std::string, std::pair<const int *, size_t> >::iterator
00266         it = feature_cache_.find(key);
00267     if (it != feature_cache_.end()) {
00268       path->fvector = it->second.first;
00269       it->second.second++;
00270     } else {
00271       if (!buildBigramFeature(path, rfeature1.c_str(), lfeature2.c_str()))
00272         return false;
00273       feature_cache_.insert(std::pair
00274                             <std::string, std::pair<const int *, size_t> >
00275                             (key, std::make_pair<const int *, size_t>
00276                              (path->fvector, 1)));
00277     }
00278   }
00279 
00280   CHECK_DIE(path->fvector) << " fvector is NULL";
00281   CHECK_DIE(path->rnode->fvector) << "fevector is NULL";
00282 
00283   return true;
00284 }
00285 
00286 bool FeatureIndex::buildUnigramFeature(LearnerPath *path,
00287                                        const char *ufeature) {
00288   char ubuf[BUFSIZE];
00289   char *F[POSSIZE];
00290 
00291   feature_.clear();
00292   std::strncpy(ubuf, ufeature, BUFSIZE);
00293   size_t usize = tokenizeCSV(ubuf, F, POSSIZE);
00294 
00295   for (std::vector<const char*>::const_iterator it = unigram_templs_.begin();
00296        it != unigram_templs_.end(); ++it) {
00297     const char *p = *it;
00298     os_.clear();
00299 
00300     for (; *p; p++) {
00301       switch (*p) {
00302         default: os_ << *p; break;
00303         case '\\': os_ << getEscapedChar(*++p); break;
00304         case '%': {
00305           switch (*++p) {
00306             case 'F':  {
00307               const char *r = getIndex(const_cast<char **>(&p), F, usize);
00308               if (!r) goto NEXT;
00309               os_ << r;
00310             } break;
00311             case 't':  os_ << (size_t)path->rnode->char_type;     break;
00312             case 'u':  os_ << ufeature; break;
00313             default:
00314               CHECK_FALSE(false) << "unkonwn meta char: " <<  *p;
00315           }
00316         }
00317       }
00318     }
00319 
00320     os_ << '\0';
00321     ADDB(os_.str());
00322 
00323  NEXT: continue;
00324   }
00325 
00326   COPY_FEATURE(path->rnode->fvector);
00327 
00328   return true;
00329 }
00330 
00331 bool FeatureIndex::buildBigramFeature(LearnerPath *path,
00332                                       const char *rfeature,
00333                                       const char *lfeature) {
00334   char rbuf[BUFSIZE];
00335   char lbuf[BUFSIZE];
00336   char *R[POSSIZE];
00337   char *L[POSSIZE];
00338 
00339   feature_.clear();
00340   std::strncpy(lbuf,  rfeature, BUFSIZE);
00341   std::strncpy(rbuf,  lfeature, BUFSIZE);
00342 
00343   size_t lsize = tokenizeCSV(lbuf, L, POSSIZE);
00344   size_t rsize = tokenizeCSV(rbuf, R, POSSIZE);
00345 
00346   for (std::vector<const char*>::const_iterator it = bigram_templs_.begin();
00347        it != bigram_templs_.end(); ++it) {
00348     const char *p = *it;
00349     os_.clear();
00350 
00351     for (; *p; p++) {
00352       switch (*p) {
00353         default: os_ << *p; break;
00354         case '\\': os_ << getEscapedChar(*++p); break;
00355         case '%': {
00356           switch (*++p) {
00357             case 'L': {
00358               const char *r = getIndex(const_cast<char **>(&p), L, lsize);
00359               if (!r) goto NEXT;
00360               os_ << r;
00361             } break;
00362             case 'R': {
00363               const char *r = getIndex(const_cast<char **>(&p), R, rsize);
00364               if (!r) goto NEXT;
00365               os_ << r;
00366             } break;
00367             case 'l':  os_ << lfeature; break;  // use lfeature as it is
00368             case 'r':  os_ << rfeature; break;
00369             default:
00370               CHECK_FALSE(false) << "unkonwn meta char: " <<  *p;
00371           }
00372         }
00373       }
00374     }
00375 
00376     os_ << '\0';
00377 
00378     ADDB(os_.str());
00379 
00380  NEXT: continue;
00381   }
00382 
00383   COPY_FEATURE(path->fvector);
00384 
00385   return true;
00386 }

00388 int DecoderFeatureIndex::id(const char *key) {
00389   return da_.exactMatchSearch<Darts::DoubleArray::result_type>(key);
00390 }
00391 
00392 int EncoderFeatureIndex::id(const char *key) {
00393   std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = dic_.find(key);
00394   if (it == dic_.end()) {
00395     dic_.insert(std::make_pair<std::string, int>(std::string(key), maxid_));
00396     return maxid_++;
00397   } else {
00398     return it->second;
00399   }
00400   return -1;
00401 }
00402 
00403 void EncoderFeatureIndex::shrink(size_t freq,
00404                                  std::vector<double> *observed) {
00405   if (freq <= 1) return;
00406 
00407   // count fvector
00408   std::vector<size_t> freqv(maxid_);
00409   std::fill(freqv.begin(), freqv.end(), 0);
00410   for (std::map<std::string, std::pair<const int*, size_t> >::const_iterator
00411            it = feature_cache_.begin();
00412        it != feature_cache_.end(); ++it) {
00413     for (const int *f = it->second.first; *f != -1; ++f)
00414       freqv[*f] += it->second.second;  // freq
00415   }
00416 
00417   // make old2new map
00418   maxid_ = 0;
00419   std::map<int, int> old2new;
00420   for (size_t i = 0; i < freqv.size(); ++i) {
00421     if (freqv[i] >= freq)
00422       old2new.insert(std::make_pair<int, int>(i, maxid_++));
00423   }
00424 
00425   // update dic_
00426   for (std::map<std::string, int>::iterator
00427            it = dic_.begin(); it != dic_.end();) {
00428     std::map<int, int>::const_iterator it2 = old2new.find(it->second);
00429     if (it2 != old2new.end()) {
00430       it->second = it2->second;
00431       ++it;
00432     } else {
00433       dic_.erase(it++);
00434     }
00435   }
00436 
00437   // update all fvector
00438   for (std::map<std::string, std::pair<const int*, size_t> >::const_iterator
00439            it = feature_cache_.begin(); it != feature_cache_.end(); ++it) {
00440     int *to = const_cast<int *>(it->second.first);
00441     for (const int *f = it->second.first; *f != -1; ++f) {
00442       std::map<int, int>::const_iterator it2 = old2new.find(*f);
00443       if (it2 != old2new.end()) {
00444         *to = it2->second;
00445         ++to;
00446       }
00447     }
00448     *to = -1;
00449   }
00450 
00451   // update observed vector
00452   std::vector<double> observed_new(maxid_);
00453   for (size_t i = 0; i < observed->size(); ++i) {
00454     std::map<int, int>::const_iterator it = old2new.find(static_cast<int>(i));
00455     if (it != old2new.end())
00456       observed_new[it->second] = (*observed)[i];
00457   }
00458 
00459   *observed = observed_new;  // copy
00460 
00461   return;
00462 }

00464 bool FeatureIndex::convert(const char* txtfile, const char *binfile) {
00465   std::ifstream ifs(txtfile);
00466 
00467   CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << txtfile;
00468 
00469   char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00470   char *column[4];
00471   std::map<std::string, double> dic;
00472 
00473   while (ifs.getline(buf, sizeof(buf))) {
00474     CHECK_DIE(tokenize2(buf, "\t", column, 2) == 2)
00475         << "format error: " << buf;
00476 
00477     dic.insert(std::make_pair<std::string, double>
00478                (std::string(column[1]), atof(column[0]) ));
00479   }
00480 
00481   std::ofstream ofs(binfile, std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00482   CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << binfile;
00483 
00484   std::vector<char *> key;
00485   unsigned int size = static_cast<unsigned int>(dic.size());
00486   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&size), sizeof(unsigned int));
00487 
00488   for (std::map<std::string, double>::const_iterator
00489            it = dic.begin(); it != dic.end(); ++it) {
00490     key.push_back(const_cast<char*>(it->first.c_str()));
00491     ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&it->second), sizeof(double));
00492   }
00493 
00494   Darts::DoubleArray da;
00495   CHECK_DIE(da.build(key.size(), &key[0], 0, 0, 0) == 0)
00496       << "unkown error in building double array: " << binfile;
00497 
00498   ofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(da.array()),
00499             da.unit_size() * da.size());
00500 
00501   return true;
00502 }
00503 
00504 bool EncoderFeatureIndex::save(const char *filename) {
00505   std::ofstream ofs(filename);
00506 
00507   CHECK_FALSE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << filename;
00508 
00509   ofs.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00510   ofs.precision(24);
00511 
00512   for (std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator it = dic_.begin();
00513        it != dic_.end(); ++it)
00514     ofs << alpha_[it->second] << "\t" << it->first << std::endl;
00515 
00516   return true;
00517 }
